Name: Recreation Room
About the game: Recreation Room allows you to take a walk in a big variety of environments and landscapes. Enter a dense forest, hike along its paths and listen to its sounds. Explore the infinite vastness of the woods, or maybe find a spot to just bask in nature, breathe in the environment and let go of the stress of the real world. Future features: customizable time of day or night different environments to choose from, like hills, meadows, different kinds of woods, and more points of interest, like old ruins, a cave, a medieval watch tower, or even a mystical fairy ground bigger selection of ambient music more locomotion options
Meta Title: Recreation Room: Jun 21, 2022, Heptamind and Full Overview
